name: RestaurantandRetailMarketing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: If you own a restaurant or retail store, this Flash Briefing is for you. Every day, you'll hear about consumer trends, digital marketing tips and advice to help you decide where to focus your time and money. We'll pay especially close attention to demystifying digital marketing topics — so you can stay on top of the most important developments.
